content: 1 sharecare hat by raina kruus © 2021 sharecare hat by raina kruus this design has been inspired by caring and sharing share the hat with your partner brother sister or parents sharecare hat is perfect for your family s next eye-catching adventure as it is as enjoyable to knit as it is to wear it s the perfect unisex hat knitted in gorgeous brioche stitch which makes it fully reversible once you get into the rythm of it brioche stitch is no more difficult than basic ribbing you get to try out a new stitch pattern and end up with a cute design simple and easy to knit the sharecare hat can be made with or without a brim just using any contrasting dk weight yarns there are two different versions of the hat which one will you make 2 sharecare hat by raina kruus © 2021 construction this hat is worked in the round from the bottom up starting with the brim or not the pattern has notes for version 2 without the brim continuing with the body part and the crown is shaped by decreases which is finished on double pointed needles two-color brioche is unique and the result is like two different hats -
